description: [TrickBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0266) can use secondary C2 servers for communication after establishing connectivity and relaying victim information to primary C2 servers.(Citation: Cyberreason Anchor December 2019)

external_references.description: Dahan, A. et al. (2019, December 11). DROPPING ANCHOR: FROM A TRICKBOT INFECTION TO THE DISCOVERY OF THE ANCHOR MALWARE. Retrieved September 10, 2020.
